Description: Lower body sherd of South Ionian pottery cup, presumably with everted rim; interior reserved with black (fired red) band; exterior: reserved; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: The lack of diagnostic features makes it difficult to determine from which type of South Ionian cups with everted rims the sherd belongs.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GE.223) (Phase 3)
